message: The SDG_INDICATOR field for indicator 12-7-1, translated into en
data:
Indicator 12.7.1: Number of countries implementing sustainable public procurement policies and action plans[1]

1

Refinement of the indicator name approved in the interim by the Inter-agency and Expert Group on SDG Indicators (IAEG-SDGs) and pending final approval by the 54th session of the Statistical Commission in March 2023. ↑
